text: Antoine Félix Mathé (1808-1882) was a French politician. ==Early life== Antoine Félix Mathé was born on May 18, 1808, in Cosne-d'Allier, Auvergne, rural France.National Assembly: Antoine Félix Mathé ==Career== He served as a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1848 to 1851. He was far left. ==Death== He died on March 5, 1882, in Moulins, Auvergne. ==References== Category:1808 births Category:1882 deaths Category:People from Allier Category:Politicians from Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes Category:The Mountain (1849) politicians Category:Members of the 1848 Constituent Assembly Category:Members of the National Legislative Assembly of the French Second Republic
title: Antoine Félix Mathé
